thread.title: Excellent hotel, and great staff
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel, and great staff - Review of Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Scottmoney10
title: Excellent hotel, and great staff
text: The room was great for what we needed. We spend most of our time out and when we get back we like a nice bed, nice room and good bathroom. This had it all. They gave us a late checkout at no extra garage which allowed us to tour the city even more. The staff was so nice and accommodating. We didn't check out the bar attached but it looked cool. Next time. Great stay and a very good location. Love Chelsea.
